titleInfo.title: Opinion of Commissioner Kennedy in the case of Looney Riley, an applicant for the value of a reservation, under the treaty of the 29th Dec[ember] 1835, and the supplement thereto, 1838 [?] May [?]

mods.abstract: Printed legal opinion of Commissioner Kennedy, (May 1838 ?) and letter dated May 26, 1838 from Attorney General Benjamin F. Butler to Joel R. Poinsett, Secretary of War, in which Butler voices his agreement with Kennedy's decision. Kennedy reviews the petition of Looney Riley relative to the property rights of Cherokee reservees and the treaties of 1817, 1819, and 1835, deciding against Riley.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: This MODS record was generated into MODS v3.5 from the TEI teiHeader by University of Tennessee Libraries Digital Initiatives, using a stylesheet available at https://github.com/utkdigitalinitiatives/tei-to-mods.
